snippet: Richard Mourdock, who defeated Senator Richard G. Lugar in Indiana’s Republican primary, has been committed to geology, motorcycling, marathons and a belief that only one party must prevail.
abstract: Man in the News profile of Richard E Mourdock, who defeated Indiana Republican Sen Richard G Lugar in the state's primary; Mourdock wants to cease the efforts at bipartisanship that defined the six-term tenure of Lugar and push for a more conservative agenda among Republicans in Congress.

byline.contributor: Kitty Bennett and Monica Davey contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Richard Mourdock, who defeated Senator Richard G. Lugar in Indiana’s Republican primary, has been committed to geology, motorcycling, marathons and a belief that only one party must prevail.

headline.seo: Richard Mourdock’s Many Pursuits Don’t Include Bipartisanship
headline.main: Many Pursuits, but Bipartisanship Isn’t One of Them
headline.print_headline: Many Pursuits, but Bipartisanship Isn’t One of Them
headline.content_kicker: Man in the News | Richard Mourdock
